aboutPage.title: Art in the Form of Code
aboutPage.subtitle: Discover the philosophy and passion that drive every Whiskline Studio project.
aboutPage.missionText: At Whiskline Studio, we believe that games and applications are more than just code; they are forms of art. Our philosophy is simple: to create fair and polished digital experiences, where every detail is carefully designed to surprise and respect the time of those who play and use our products. Each project is a blank canvas, an opportunity to build the worlds and tools that we, as enthusiasts ourselves, would love to use.
aboutPage.pillar1Text: We explore unique concepts and innovative mechanics to create games and apps that stand out and entertain.
aboutPage.pillar2Text: The best experience is our obsession. From the interface to the gameplay, everything is designed to be intuitive, enjoyable, and fair.
aboutPage.pillar3Text: We are personally dedicated to every project, ensuring a level of polish and attention to detail that only passion can provide.
aboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Explore the worlds we've created and see our passion in action.
